website_summaries.verdict: This steering wheel cover doesn't get at hot in the sun.
pros: Tends to stay cooler to the touch
cons: Can be tight to put on and will need to be stretched to fit on many vehicles

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: When it arrived, the first thing I thought was there was no way it would fit the big steering wheel in my RAM. It took letting it get warm in the sun, and a little muscle, but I got it on and it's perfect! The cover is nice and snug and feels great. We'll see how it wears over time, but so far I'm very impressed with the quality, look, and feel of the cover.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Browning

customer_reviews.title: Great product at great price.
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Exactly what I was looking for. I wanted something that had nice grip, was durable, and was resistant to high temperatures. It was definitely a little hard to get on the wheel, but I would rather spend a few mins on this than taking 1.5 hours to sew one.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan F.

customer_reviews.title: Stubborn but worth it.
customer_reviews.text: A little stubborn but with enough elbow grease even I could get it on my steering wheel (I'm a small female). It feels great and it's perfect. Would highly recommend! I fit it on my 2017 Subaru Forester, for reference.
customer_reviews.author: Liv

customer_reviews.title: Great match for light grey Toyota interior
customer_reviews.text: This cover matches the light grey interior Toyota Sienna perfectly, so it doesn't scream "after market". I was worried it would be too difficult to put on based on other reviews however it wasn't bad. This may be since it was warm from a hot texas ups truck when I put it on. It fits perfectly snug so throw in the dryer for a minute and it should slip on.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Quality Life Improvement
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with my purchase. IDK how excited others are about car steering wheel covers but this was a quality life improvement for me. The install was literally less than 2 minutes for me. This includes stretching when taking the cover out of the packaging. You can look at my photo and I do not see any creases. I was a little worried that the cover wouldn't fit but the material stretched enough to create a tight fit around the wheel. I would recommend this brand to anyone that is looking for a wheel cover.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Hodgson

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! It looks & feel so high quality without breaking the bank! Matches & fits my 2014 Toyota Corolla perfectly. Happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Christopher  Nodarse

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit well. Does not feel good. Does not look good
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2013 Honda Civic lx and I bought this item because some areas of the steering wheel were starting to get worn out from gripping. The item I received does not fit snit. It looks awkward and fits very loose. It looks like a wet spegetii on my steering wheel. It does not feel good or look good.
customer_reviews.author: Wiliam Moreno

customer_reviews.title: great quality for a couple of months, then it falls apart and so need to drop my rating
customer_reviews.text: An update to my review - I liked the product at first and would still like it if the stitching wasn't coming apart. I guess if it keeps happening the product will become worthless and will need to find another brand that lasts longer than 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: PF

customer_reviews.title: It was not a “microfiber” material. It was closer ...
customer_reviews.text: It was not a “microfiber” material. It was closer to vinyl. Plus, it did not fit the F-150, as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Wick, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: It was great, got to use it for a week before our car was stolen...
customer_reviews.text: My husband has arthritis in his hands, so a good steering wheel cover is a must. It fit well, looked good and was exactly what he needed. A week after he put it on, the car was stolen from his work parking lot. The police recovered the car in about a week, which we are very grateful for, but the thief took everything of ours our of the car, including the brand new steering wheel cover. Darn it. We got a basket of laundry, a kid's blanket and pillow, a leather jacket, and an obviously stolen flat screen TV with great speakers in return. I'd rather have the steering wheel cover back.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret C.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but poor craftsmanship
customer_reviews.text: I bought my first one of these because it looked comfortable and affordable, and my current steering wheel was pretty bad off. In that sense, anything would have been an improvement and this definitely was. I did notice that the thread on one of the seams was coming loose, but I just trimmed it up. I did eventually order a second one for another car and the thread on the second one was coming loose in the exact same seam spot. So far they both appear to be holding up, but overall craftsmanship is consistently so so.
customer_reviews.author: TB

customer_reviews.title: It looks pretty dope
customer_reviews.text: This cover looks GREAT with my new seat covers. It fits well and is made of quality material. There were a couple of stray threads which I cut with a pair of scissors, but other than that it’s a good cover. This definitely has enhanced the looks of my new car in the way I was expecting! 10/10 would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Jayden

customer_reviews.title: Not Good
customer_reviews.text: This only covered about half of the steering wheel, leaving a large gap in the inside. It also made the wheel so thick that it was awkward to grip. I removed it immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Josie

customer_reviews.title: Has a very nice soft touch leather feel to it
customer_reviews.text: Has a very nice soft touch leather feel to it. It was a battle to get onto my Sierra steering wheel which is good meaning it shouldn't shift or come loose. When you're fighting to get this on, here's a tip: instead of wrestling away from yourself, loop it past the wheel onto the column, then mount it towards you. This makes it easier to see what you're fighting as well as giving better leverage with a tool to pry it over the wheel. I used the handle of a crescent wrench and it made it easier.
customer_reviews.author: Zodwraith

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I'm Kristi's husband and I got this for my 2005 Ram. When I first tried a test fit, I thought there was no way it would fit. Saw other reviews saying to warm it up with a hairdryer and with some elbow grease, you can work it on. I threw mine in the clothes dryer for five minutes, enough to make the material plyable and it went on without much work at all. I just checked it after it sat outside in 40 degree weather and it has shaped to the wheel nicely with no slippage. Hope this trick helps others!
customer_reviews.author: inspirationkitchen

customer_reviews.title: 👍
customer_reviews.text: feels like decent material and it feels like it is sewn together pretty good it is not flimsy or thin. makesure to measure your steerling wheel, dont be a douche posting negative ads on a good product just because you couldnt take 2 minutes out of your day to measure and makesure to buy the right size. and even when you do buy the right size, be patient when putting it on! its not going to slip on and off easy peasy its supposed to fit snug so it might take a minute to get it on there but once it is on it feels good, looks good, nice grip. good find on Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Miss Erin Faye

customer_reviews.title: Not what I thought I was getting
customer_reviews.text: Not really as expected I don’t see the microfiber, seems like a all leather steering wheel cover . It was difficult to stretch over a 4th gen 4Runner steering wheel I considered returning it after the initial attempt and ended up using a lever to pry it on still took considerable effort fits nice and tight , it came folded into quadrants creased in a very small package 👎
customer_reviews.author: Doug White

customer_reviews.title: Love it, looks great and very functional.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Ford Ranger Pickup truck. My steering wheel was looking gross and it would get kind of "sticky" when it sat in the sun too long. (It's a 1993). This cover is made of vinyl but really good quality stuff... It took about 3-4 minutes to get it over my steering wheel (by gripping it and turning it until it slid over entire wheel) It looks awesome and even though my steering wheel is a little thicker now it's still perfect and turning and stuff is just as easy as before it was installed. Love this for my little truck, thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Randy from ATL

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: I receive a lot of compliments on this cover. I had a dandy time trying to get it on, however. It's a very stiff, durable, hard material and it comes folded in half. After a lot of tugging and cursing, I managed to cover my steering wheel. Worth the agony, though, because it looks so sharp. Tip: Make sure it's lined up where you want it once you push it into place because it isn't budging after that. So if you put it on slightly crooked, you'll be doing the Angry Hop down the driveway.
customer_reviews.author: angelrabbits

customer_reviews.title: Great match for a 2018 Tacoma with a beige exterior ...
customer_reviews.text: Great match for a 2018 Tacoma with a beige exterior - helps to tie together the exterior and interior color schemes where the interior is usually just all grey or black. Tight fitting - highly recommend using a few 12-inch rope pieces to secure it to steering wheel as you go along. Zip ties and other methods will work just as well - but anything that needs cutting to remove after installation comes with additional risks. Small ropes are best.
customer_reviews.author: DCTech

customer_reviews.title: Not microfiber. All leather!
customer_reviews.text: I drive a lot and was hoping it would be comfortable on my hands. I tried it for about 2 months. My original steering wheel is better now after removing it. There's nothing microfiber about the exterior skin It's all leather and I can feel the stiches so I don't understand the advertising description.
customer_reviews.author: EDMIL

customer_reviews.title: This is my 2nd one
customer_reviews.text: I just bought a 2017 GMC Acadia (same as Terrain), and the factory wheel is just too slippery for my taste. Installing this cover took a bit of effort but the results are worth it. I started from the bottom of the wheel and worked my way up. Top-to-bottom method wasn't successful. I was able to install it without the wife's help this time. The texture is perfect, the cushioning is nice, and the matte finish doesn't glare. Mine is a black one. At first I thought I installed it backwards, but looking at the pictures assured me it was OK. The old one from the 2006 Buick Ranier was just a little too big and was slightly loose.
customer_reviews.author: Ron N.

customer_reviews.title: A solid wheel cover for the money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to cover the steering wheel on an aging '06 Mazda6, and it worked great for the purpose. Super simple to slip on and comfortable to hold. I found it to be a comfortable cushioned grip, but for those with small hands it might seem a bit big around. Also, there's nothing to really hold it in place apart from the stretched fit, so it can feel like it twists on occasion with a tight grip. Even still, a really good cover for the money.
customer_reviews.author: J. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Is good cover
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to cover up my steering wheel that was falling apart and leaving my hands covered in little black particulates. This thing was a little tough to get on and even tougher to get on straight, but once I got it on, I'm generally pleased. It doesn't quite hug my steering wheel at the edges like I kind of expected it would be able to magically do, but it feels good in my hands and doesn't slip on the wheel and I don't expect that it will. So while it doesn't 100% meet my unrealistic expectations, I'm pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: John Harris

customer_reviews.title: This review applies to Tesla M3 only
customer_reviews.text: I'll start off by saying that the white wheel cover is very aesthetically pleasing. It does look gorgeous with the white interior of my car. But unfortunately for me it did not work out because it's just too loose. The cover spins on the wheel whilst making turns and it adds a lot of bulk (thickness) to the wheel too so difficult to hold naturally. Really wanted to like this and wish it could be a tighter fit on the Model 3.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Gee

customer_reviews.title: A Lot Of Reviews Here Are Lies
customer_reviews.text: It's 14 3/8 inches in diameter and does not stretch at all. Its plastic. Not rubber, not leather. Impossible to put on a 15.0" steering wheel. NO! It does NOT stretch. I've been had.
customer_reviews.author: OlderWiserReader

customer_reviews.title: The quality of this product is very good HOWEVER.
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this product is very good HOWEVER... the problem was it barely wrapped around my Acura RDX steering wheel. It just didn't looked nice with so much of the inside of the steering wheel finish STILL exposed and visible... I hope the manufacturers will address this and make the leather FRONT and BACK almost meet at the SEAM for wider steering wheels. Then I would definitely buy it again but for now it doesn't work on my steering wheel...
customer_reviews.author: ChrisE

customer_reviews.title: it's perfect. I was hoping it would protect my steering ...
customer_reviews.text: It's made well, but it doesn't do anything for heat. It does seem very well constructed, so if you are just going for the aesthetics, it's perfect. I was hoping it would protect my steering wheel from getting too hot in the sun, definitely not good for that. The stitching looks nice and seems well done.
customer_reviews.author: NomNom

customer_reviews.title: Not microfiber.
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't microfiber, it was just regular leather, and it was about two inches too small for my steering wheel.
customer_reviews.author: Travon

customer_reviews.title: Quality product, easy to install, looks good!
customer_reviews.text: Product was easier to install than I was led to believe. It took less than a minute to install and it looks great. My original Hyundai Santa Fe steering wheel had started to disintegrate along the top edge (UV issue?) and was very rough to the touch. This covers the original steering wheel and restores that new car steering wheel texture. It was easy to install, like installing a new tire on my bicycle. after fitting the cover over the top edge of the wheel I just alternated from right to left pulling the cover over the wheel a little bit on each side until it was fully fitted over the steering wheel.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J McLaughlin

customer_reviews.title: Do not order for Acura MDX
customer_reviews.text: Did not work for me on my Acura MDX. The Acura's steering wheel is too beefy for this cover, too much of the old wheel would be exposed and would not look right. I couldn't get in on all the way even after letting it acclimate. I did not try to send back because I kind of destroyed the packaging while taking it out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good replacement steering cover
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my daughter. She has an Xterra, and the wheel is Standard Nissan size. The original steering wheel was peeling away and left little bits of material on her hands. She really seems to like the replacement cover- I asked her to tell me a little about it. She said that the fabric does wick moisture away, and it was easy to slip on. The fabric itself feels more like a faux leather than microfiber, as described. This was a good purchase and I would definitely buy again if we need replacements in the future. She says she wishes there were more options as far as colors/pattern.
customer_reviews.author: Lyssa

customer_reviews.title: Slightly disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This steering wheel cover looks very nice, but there are a couple of minuses. First, it is too large for the Honda Civic steering wheel. I had to place the Styrofoam block inside in the cover to keep it from sliding. Also, the leather it made from is too thick and makes the diameter of the steering wheel very large, which is a bit uncomfortable for the lady's hands. I had to debate whether to return it or not, but settled with what I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Trendy Tail

customer_reviews.title: Junk ...Don't Buy
customer_reviews.text: Very cheaply made. Not worth the price. Doesn't even look close to the picture. The instructions says to get a third hand if it is hard to install????
customer_reviews.author: SolarSpark

customer_reviews.title: Be ready for a battle to put it on.
customer_reviews.text: When I read reviews of this being difficult to put on, I thought it was just a few complainers. My truck is a 2015 GMC Sierra with a steering wheel that fits within guidelines. I'm 6'-1" a general contractor and move large lumber and tools around for a living, I'm not weak. This cover was a real bear to put on, and I followed directions. It's doable, but be ready for an effort. The comfort is good but I found it a bit thick. Maybe I just need to get used to it. Considering how hard I had to tug & pull on it, not tearing in the process, I assume it will hold up. We shall see....
customer_reviews.author: KCC

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable to grip.  Exceeded my expectations!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 2011 Volvo S80. Wood grain on my steering wheel has a tear and can't be repaired. This fits my car perfectly. Luckily there were instructions (you have to look for the card) that said it may take two people to do put the cover on. I tried to install it solo, but it kept slipping off. I finally sought the assistance of my daughter. I got her to firmly hold the cover in place at the top of the steering wheel, so that I could pull the rest of the cover over the steering wheel. Bingo! It is so comfortable, it matches my dashboard, it doesn't have a bad odor, and the price was right.
customer_reviews.author: EH

customer_reviews.title: and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to cover a worn and ugly steering wheel for a newly assigned work vehicle, an Escape hybrid. I wanted something inexpensive on my own dime, and easy to install. I tried installing it the day after I got it, which was an unsuccessful wrestling match. So I left it in the vehicle for several days which turned into a couple of weeks, for various reasons. By the time I tried again, it took about 7 minutes, and no wrestling and no creases. It makes the steering wheel a bit wider than I prefer but there is a little give to the cover that makes it reasonably comfortable. Not bad value for the money, so far.
customer_reviews.author: magill1986

customer_reviews.title: Overall good minus broken threads.
customer_reviews.text: I'm writing my review based off initial install and use. Packaging received intact and in good condition, initial appearance and feel of product was reassuring. Installed to a 2017 Chevy Colorado with a 15" steering wheel, within spec. Overall install was a bit tough, all done with out any tooling, a bit of a workout to seat over form of wheel. After install product fit snuggly, and securely, feel is comfortable and grip tight. Overall 4 stars, due to observation of broken threading, currently threading isnt unraveling, im unsure if this was a result of install or defect. If threading remains intact I will leave review at 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: D00d

customer_reviews.title: Thick, chusy steering wheel cover
customer_reviews.text: Installed this on my 2006 Toyota Tacoma truck, when my original steering wheel started to deteriorate. This was a very tight fit, but once on, it's in place and holding well. It's a rather thick solution, so even after a few months I'm reminded that it's not the original every time I drive. It has a soft, cushy feel to it, which again is not like the original steering wheel. If you're wanting something that is more like the manufacturer wheel, then go with something less thick. You'll definitely notice a difference with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Stu TO

customer_reviews.title: Snug Fit but Perfect for Toyota
customer_reviews.text: This fits my Toyota Corolla perfectly, absolutely happy with the wheel cover. When it first arrived I was sure I ordered the incorrect size, especially after I tired to put it on. After 5 minutes of adjusting it I was very pleased with the end result. I’ve owned a couple of wheel covers over time but I have to say this is my favorite so far. It feels real durable I’m sure this will last me awhile. I’m glad I found it in white since it matches the outside of my car, definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Camacho

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth it! Get it!
customer_reviews.text: I only gave it 2 stars for "easy install" because it's not and I want the next person to know so they are prepared to use some muscle, or call a friend lol. I want to be clear that THIS IS A GOOD THING! It screams quality because it took me a bit of time, and a lot of strength to put it on. This thing is GREAT! I just recently got a new truck and I used to knick the steering wheel of my older jeep with my wedding band, and didn't want the same to happen to my new vehicle. This does the trick for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Rojas

customer_reviews.title: Good looking and relatively easy to install
customer_reviews.text: My steering wheel had started to flake. It would leave a grey powder on my hands after even a short drive. I'd hoped there would be a nice cover that was less than painful to install. This product fit the bill nicely. It was inexpensive and looks great. It took a little bit of elbow grease to get in stretched on to my wheel but it was well worth it. It covers all the imperfections and gives me a good gripping surface.
customer_reviews.author: Vince Averello

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and well made
customer_reviews.text: This product is just what I wanted. My steering wheel is 14.75" outer diameter, which is right in the middle of the given size range for this item. I was able to install it by myself with a bit of stretching, and I have early arthritis in my hands. I'd imagine if you're closer to the 15.25" max then you might need help. It's very comfortable and makes the steering wheel wider, which also helps my hands feel better and have a firmer grip on the wheel. It's nice and sturdy, seems to be well made, and no stitching issues that I can find.
customer_reviews.author: J&B

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT REPLACEMENT!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a common steering wheel cover I had on my 2004 Does Taurus. It was the plasticy leather kind. It was fine for the most part but the left side where I rested my hand started to crack very badly from the sunlight. The SEG cover fit perfectly and feels MUCH better. I love the microfiber feel when I'm cutting through traffic in Central Jersey. Definitely in control. I'm definitely thinking of buying another for my other car. Money VERY WELL spent. 👍🏾
customer_reviews.author: Bigg Russ

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase - Have 2 now!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for a Mazda CX 9 as the steering wheel was worn looking. It looks great! It took less than 5 minutes to get it on the wheel and was very snug once it is on. Makes the steering wheel look new! Since that worked out so well we bought one for a 2010 Nissan Murano and worked well and looks great on that wheel too. Start at the top when installing and slowly work your way around the edges, wrapping around the wheel as you go. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: M. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Does what I need
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because my 04 Honda Steering wheel started to peel in my hands and lap. I wanted something simple that would be comfortable. This was perfect for the price. I was unable to install it myself I struggled and had to call in reinforcements (my dad) and he used a crowbar. Needless to say I don't think its going anywhere. But I have enjoyed it. Its not to bulky and its doing the job I need. So if you are looking for a simple and effective steering wheel cover this is the one.
customer_reviews.author: BlackRose

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit afraid, after reading reviews, that I wouldn't be able to get this on my steering wheel by myself. I have a 2009 Hyundai Santa Fe and the steering wheel was peeling. I actually left the package in my vehicle all day in the hot summer sun (so maybe that helped?) Then struggled for maybe 60 secs to get it on. It is tight, but obviously is supposed to be. It looks great and is definitely more resistant to the extreme temps in Wisconsin. Was warm but not boiling on 90F summer days and insulated to the cold well today at -8F. I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: GET

customer_reviews.title: Great steering wheel cover
customer_reviews.text: I currently drive a 2015 MB C300. I wanted a steering wheel cover to avoid damaging or causing deterioration to the steering wheel, so bought this. Fitment is great, just know that you will have to wrestle with it to install. It might help to heat the cover up before installing with a hair dryer (which I didn't do). Looks and feels great, adds some thickness to the steering wheel (which I prefer) and has good grip. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Poor packaging
customer_reviews.text: Received this item all knotted up like a pretzel in a plastic cover. Upon opening plastic wrap the item was still folded up and stiff and would not straighten out. I have not tried to install but just know it is not going to easy as this item is NOT very pliable.
customer_reviews.author: AlClemons

customer_reviews.title: Nice protection but nothing like the factory wheel.
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality leather for how much this costs. I really hope that the creases and bends come out and mold to the steering wheel after a little while. I wish they didn't fold it into the shipbox like they do so there would be no creases but I guess they have to bend it at least once. Overall it is nice quality. Nothing like the original factory wheel feeling though! This obviously makes it a little bulkier and thicker but that is a given!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Van Olphen

customer_reviews.title: I like it...
customer_reviews.text: Seems fine. First time I have ever owned a cover. Had to lay it in the sun and fight it like crazy to get it to fit... But by my understanding that is a good thing. It will relax very tight on the wheel. Otherwise after a week with it on I am fairly used to it. Only complaint, is slightly less "sticky" than my actual steering wheel. So when turning I need to grip the wheel a tiny bit more. Overall... I like it so far. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: MertziePlays

customer_reviews.title: Fits great on a 2018 Corolla LE
customer_reviews.text: Fits great on a 2018 Corolla LE. You do have to take your time when putting it on the steering wheel as it might seem it's a tad too small (it isn't). Once you carefully stretch it around the wheel, it fits great. I did do what the enclosed instructions suggest-- take it out of the packaging and re-form it back into a circular shape. I wish I had a hair dryer or similar heating element to warm it up. I was going to let it sit in the sun but I couldn't wait to put it on and it was already near dusk when I received it.
customer_reviews.author: FPCastle

customer_reviews.title: Great cover, well worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why they call this microfiber but otherwise nice wheelcover. Feels like pebblegrain leather... I purchased this for my 98 Jeep Cherokee. Wheel is starting to peel and gets sticky during the summer..Purchased a Jeep product last winter but was too cold to apply cover so recently was able to install. Hated it immediately. To thick, slippery, just horrible..Was going to purchase the wheel skin you sew on but who wants to do that for 3 hours so I opted for this cover. Feels similar to the wheel of a German car I owned back before life got in the way..Anyway, nice cover. Recommend highly...Let sit on your dash in the sun for a bit before installing...
customer_reviews.author: Tahoeskier

customer_reviews.title: Tight fit!
customer_reviews.text: I have a Honda HRV: It was little tight to get on and required a bit of leverage to get it to stretch enough to go all the way on. However, really like how it feels; much more pleasant in the cold than the naked steering wheel and improves my grip. Assuming it will help in the summer too, when the steering wheel gets blazing hot. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: shirleygr

customer_reviews.title: A great addition to the comfort of driving.
customer_reviews.text: After reading reviews that mentioned difficulty putting the steering wheel cover I was pleasantly surprised by the ease I had putting it on. I just kind of wrapped it around the steering wheel as I put it on. I purchased it after living in Florida where my steering wheel would get so hot that you couldn't touch it. This answered all my problems along with being extremely comfortable to hold. I am most happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: cherecat

customer_reviews.title: Material NOT HEAT RESISTANT
customer_reviews.text: I bought this wheel cover to add to my car hoping to avoid driving with the SUPER HOT wheel under the sun exposure in hot weather, BUT IT TURN OUT JUST THE SAME because the material used to makes this cover also gets REALLY HOT- it HEATS UP just the same so it DOESN’T HELP ME AT ALL for my purpose !!!
customer_reviews.author: Fan of Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Great for what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this steering wheel cover because, due to the heat in the area where I live, my steering wheel was starting to peel a little bit. I found it to be unsightly, so decided I needed a cover. This cover works perfectly and also prevents me from burning my hands on hot summer days. It is fairly difficult to install, however. You really have to stretch it. This prevents the cover from slipping off once it's on, but installation might be difficult for those with less hand strength or with disabilities. I suggest leaving it in the car on a hot day--the heat makes the fabric easier to stretch. Overall, I'm very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Aggressive Secretary

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!! WILL BE RETURNING
customer_reviews.text: Not microfiber and it was so created I couldn’t get it on the steering wheel
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: Didn't fit
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a 2018 Ford Escape, after taking plastic off of it, there was still plastic residue on the cover. Figured it would wear off with use, so didn't worry about it. Went to install and it wasn't even close to fitting the steering wheel. Decent price and nice look, but it was not useable due to fit, sent back.
customer_reviews.author: PackdHouse

customer_reviews.title: Fits 2008 Honda CRV
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little steering wheel cover! I was afraid it would feel really plastic-ey, as it's faux leather, but it actually feels really nice. Hasn't made my palms sweat while driving in the summer heat. It does seem like it won't fit when you first try it on, but just keep pulling, and you'll get there! Took me about a minute to get on, and I didn't have to resort to a hair dryer. Fits a 2008 Honda CRV like a glove. Would absolutely buy another one!
customer_reviews.author: Christy H.

customer_reviews.title: Great looking and comfortable cover for its price!
customer_reviews.text: The wheel cover arrived promptly to replace my old one. At first the product looked wrinkly but went smooth going on my wheel. The grey and black went great with the color of my interior! So far the cover has been comfortable. The material seems to be of good quality so I can expect it to last a couple years and when it finally becomes unusable I'd buy this cover again. EDIT: Noticed the cover slips slightly every time I make a left turn. After a couple of days the cover is completely skewed, and unpleasant to look at. My wheel may be slightly smaller than 15 inches but is frustrating to fix every time.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Good cover
customer_reviews.text: This cover works good as a slip on cover. It doesn't completely cover the wheel but covers most of it. This would work well in areas with hot sun. The simulated leather on today's steering wheels don't stand up to UV rays very well. Before installation I placed mine in front of a heater for about an hour so all the creases and wrinkles would go away. It was then more pliable to stretch over the wheel.
customer_reviews.author: Banditrider

customer_reviews.title: fit my 2006 civic
customer_reviews.text: The small on fits my 2006 civic original steering wheel. Right overall diameter, and not too difficult to install (I let it warm up in the sun). But the width of the wheel could have been a little wider throughout to cover more of the wheel (only goes ~60 percent). But it works! and covers the part of the 16 year old steering wheel that was disintegrating. It feels good, and I like the little extra thickness it provides.
customer_reviews.author: DaveT

customer_reviews.title: Nicely done SEG!!!
customer_reviews.text: Am I fully satisfied? 150%!!! SEG has a great quality product and customer service indeed. This is my second purchase of these wheel cover, one for a Toyota Highlander and the most recent one for a Prius C. I chose the incorrect size this second time, and by contacting SEG’s customer service once I got a replacement in a blink of an eye. No questions asked! No need to return anything! They are very friendly and professional. SEG has a faithful customer on me.
customer_reviews.author: JPla

customer_reviews.title: 2103 Toyota Highlander
customer_reviews.text: Fits great on my wife's 2013 Highlander. Let it sit out on the dash for an hour and it was pretty easy to install. Make sure to go top of the wheel and stretch to fit around the bottom. Finish looks good and it fits tight to the wheel. Plus it makes the steering wheel feel a little more substantial.
customer_reviews.author: Corey

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love it! Its hard to put on the steering wheel but eventually it fit. It looks amazing, it has good grip, and it came pretty quickly!
customer_reviews.author: Amber Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Did not fit at all. Way to small for a Chevy Malibu.
customer_reviews.author: Btrz

customer_reviews.title: Nothing lasts forever
customer_reviews.text: At first this is just what I was looking for. It took some getting used to, as its much thicker than the wheel. I grew to really like it. However, it doesn’t last forever. A few months ago, the exterior has started to crack. This month it started to peel. I bought this in 2017, so over 2 years of use. Will I buy another one to replace it? Depends on what else is out there. I don’t want to buy things that are disposable, but being in product design myself... you want the customer to come back and buy more eventually...
customer_reviews.author: RH

customer_reviews.title: Meh...
customer_reviews.text: First of all, this steering wheel cover is definitely NOT leather, doesn't smell like it, doesn't feel like it, and doesn't even look like it! I bought it for my daughter's car and after seeing it, I feel it is over-priced. It arrived folded in quarters, so is currently all creased looking on the steering wheel, but I hope it smooths out after a while. It was hard to put on so it's staying on unless those crimps don't smooth out.
customer_reviews.author: TucsonTNR

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive solution
customer_reviews.text: It took 5 minutes to get it on my Honda CRV steering wheel that had begun to peel. All I did was follow the included instructions. I stretched the cover out on the floor and also slightly turned it out on the edges to make it flexible. The feel took a few drives to get accustomed to the thicker wheel...not excessive but noticeable at first. But now it feels comfo and I have no problems. I got the solid grey color and it goes well with my car interior. If I need another I would buy this one. Good quality. Good price.
customer_reviews.author: Woody Carver

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and feel
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for us on a BMW X5 and it works really well. It is not too big - meaning the grip is not "fat" as I have experienced with some other grips. Some make the steering wheel too thick to hold comfortably. It fits snugly to the wheel, and it did take a little effort to get it on, but it was not that bad. I like the feel, and this is a good cover to protect the steering wheel.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Not leather.
customer_reviews.text: This is not real leather or microfiber... not as advertised. The cover is bent which i am sure it will straighten, but i wanted leather and not pleather. Quality was ok.
customer_reviews.author: SterlingW

customer_reviews.title: Ok as a quick fix
customer_reviews.text: Nice product in terms of leather feel—smooth, supple and leather. Down side is that the no stitch, stretch design on covers half the circumference of the steering wheel—just the outer wheel side—so finger wrapped around wheel are on or over the edge of the leather. Ok, but not really what I want. I am gonna try a stitch design that wrap all around the wheel. Yeah, takes time but probably much better.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Smith

customer_reviews.title: Packaging was a very poor idea.
customer_reviews.text: Everything is great about the product except the packaging. It was all crunched up in a small bag so it would fit into a shipping envelope. Not the best idea. Hopefully it takes the correct shape. Ironically I get things like CDs in a big box and things like this crammed into an envelope. It would probably be a lot smarter to put it in a big box so it retains it's shape. Not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Donna MT

customer_reviews.title: So hard to fit; but SO worthwhile once you get it fitted! (PS no smell!)
customer_reviews.text: Have both the grey and the black, to cover steering wheels grimy from years of use. These provide great coverage; they are handsome and a bit plumper, good for holding onto. Caveat: they look too small to fit! Be patient. Start with one edge, twist to work onto your steering wheel (the hot sun does NOT make them easier to manipulate!) I am a fairly feeble elder lady. Please know that perseverance will win out (took me 15 minutes or less!) PS no smell!
customer_reviews.author: Polopony

customer_reviews.title: I want to drive!
customer_reviews.text: Great looking cover! Feels high end and makes the interior look awesome. Fit my Hyundai Elantra's steering wheel perfectly. I was afraid it would feel a little loose, but on the contrary it was kind of tight to install. Made me sweat a little! Once it was installed, however, it looked like it was made for my car. It doesn't shift or anything. Makes the grip on the wheel way better than stock. So soft, I just want to keep driving! You won't be disappointed. Fits like a glove.
customer_reviews.author: arijeff945

customer_reviews.title: Very nice steering wheel cover
customer_reviews.text: I like the look and feel of this steering wheel cover. It was mostly easy to install. It only took a minute or two, but the final stretching to go over the steering wheel was a bit challenging. It fits tight, but you want it to, so it stays put. The hard plastic steering wheel on my 2003 Odyssey was showing alot of wear and tear so I bought this cover and it fits perfectly. It looks and feels like leather, but I don't think it is.
customer_reviews.author: Steve K.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a 2019 Hyundai Tucson and wanted a classy looking way to protect the steering wheel from my inevitable makeup/hair products/whatever dirt I pick up on the daily. The look of this cover perfectly compliments the interior of the car. It was a little tricky to get on, but I was able to do it by myself in about 5 minutes. I liked it so much I bought another for my SO's car. If you're looking for an inexpensive, nice-looking steering wheel cover, this is it!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Cerf

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable grip
customer_reviews.text: This is working great for cushioning my grip and having a slightly cooler steering wheel on a hot day (I got black so it's not that much cooler, but it is a little better). I understand what the other reviewers mean by it being hard to install; when I first tried to put it onto my steering wheel it was really difficult because the cover was stiff and hard to get onto the steering wheel. But then I left it in the hot for about 15 minutes and it because soft and pliable, and was super easy to slip on and took about 2-3 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Rosenthal

customer_reviews.title: Was surprised how well it actually worked out!
customer_reviews.text: Let's get the only non-con out of the way. It is not easy to place on the wheel but it isn't supposed to be. The fit has to be just right so you will undoubtedly give it more than one or two tries before it magically conforms to your wheel. I have a 2009 Beige Interior Nissan Murano SL. I could not have selected a better cover as this blends in wonderfully. The grip feels quite nice and it is void of any slippage. I have been using this cover for a few months now without issue. If one were to arise under a year of usage I will update this review.
customer_reviews.author: Brian White

customer_reviews.title: LOOKS AND FEELS LIKE A MILLION BUCKS!!
customer_reviews.text: This my second one!! One for car 1 for truck!! OH, I LIKE THESE, I SURE DO. DIFFICULT TO GET ON BUT,,,,, THIS FIT LIKE THEY WERE PUT ON IN THE FACTORY!! NOT SLOPPY BUT NICE. JUST GOT MY SISTER TO ORDER FOR HER CAR AND TRUCK!!
customer_reviews.author: SHANNON YODER

customer_reviews.title: While it is moderately hard to get on it certainly fits well and is comfortable to the hands once you drive it for a ...
customer_reviews.text: 2010 ford Fusion steering wheel was crumbling black rubbery stuff all over my pants and seats. This steering wheel cover was pants saver! While it is moderately hard to get on it certainly fits well and is comfortable to the hands once you drive it for a day. Install it by first place it over the steering wheel and then work it inch by inch over the wheel. Takes about three minutes and it is a snug fit. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: “Those who stay will be champions”

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: The description says this is a microfiber cover. What I received was "fake plastic leather", not microfiber. Was not soft at all. Cover was very stiff. I did not even install it - I just returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too small for my truck
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one that I purchased, that was supposed to fit my 2013 Dodge Ram 2500. The fact is, that does not fit well at all. It barely fits around the steering wheel and only covers about 50% of the gripping surface of the steering wheel. If you don't have a lot of finger strength or, weight to put behind pulling and stretching, you won't get it on your dodge truck.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Non slip ribbing will impress marks into your leather steering wheel.
customer_reviews.text: Product appears to be of good quality, but one look at the underside was a no go. It has a non slip ribbing on the inside. My experience in the past with covers that have this is not good. I have a leather wrapped wheel in good condition that I just want to protect. Over time those ribs and imprints will become a permanent impression into your steering wheel. So if you have a nice steering wheel, dont install this.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory G.

customer_reviews.title: Very stylish!
customer_reviews.text: Looks and feels great on my F150. Cheap but stylish upgrade for a basic steering wheel. It is very tough to get on, but I took another reviewer’s suggestion and let it warm up in the sun to make it a little easier to work with. Once on it is snug and nice. Oh and be sure to have the colors lined up straight or you will be doing the install over. It does not move once on.
customer_reviews.author: colojess

customer_reviews.title: Looks great but please measure before ordering
customer_reviews.text: Great steering wheel cover. Fwiw, don't trust Amazon's claim that it will fit your vehicle. Measure first and make sure to get the right size. I have a 2018 Toyota Tacoma. The steering wheel is 15.4 inches and this cover fits at most 15.25 inches according to packaging. The max size is already a stretch and if you have ever put one on you know how hard it is to put on an undersized one.
customer_reviews.author: Dalton Pulsipher

customer_reviews.title: Great investment for a worn steering wheel. Amazing leather feel. Tedious installation.
customer_reviews.text: This is not easy to install or adjust. Therefore it's amazing to use, it gives a secured feeling. I was skeptical about it but it feels and behaves like leather. Once on, it will be as if it was always there, part of the steering wheel. Doesn't skip or slide like other cheap steering wheel covers. It will however make your steering wheel thick. For the first couple days will feel weird due to the added thickness. Colors look nice and go along with the interior just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Yarg

customer_reviews.title: SEG Wheel Cover Is Right On The Money
customer_reviews.text: The two tone color scheme fit my 2003 Toyota Camry's interior, perfectly. The pebbled surface of the wheel cover makes for an excellent driving experience. I did leave the cover on the dash for a few hours, to let the heat from the sun, allow for the stretching, so I could fit the cover over the steering wheel. I might suggest wearing gloves, because the wheel cover, does become, quite hot to the touch! The price was quite reasonable for the quality of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Marc S. Goldhamer

customer_reviews.title: Tight fit as expected
customer_reviews.text: I have installed 8 of these on different vehicles at this point. As with the rest start by laying top over steering wheel and then just force and work it's way down around steering wheel. This one seemed a little easier than others and was worried about possible loose fit issues but, everything seems as tight as all the others. Currently writing off install ease as gains from experience from others. Will update if anything changes.
customer_reviews.author: Josiah

customer_reviews.title: Quality steering wheel cover for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I am honestly in love with this cover. It was a little hard to put it on I had to have someone else hold down one side while I stretched it over the other side, but once you get it on its not going anywhere. You don't have to worry about it slipping all over the wheel when you turn. It so feels good in your hands, it has a soft almost plush feel but it does not feel cheap. I've had it for about a month now and I have no complaints. It looks good and it feels great and the price is very reasonable for such a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Jade Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Looks and feels well made
customer_reviews.text: The product came weirdly wrapped and so I was concerned about it fitting the steering wheel. But it stretched out and fit perfectly. I purchased one for hubby's car and liked it so well I went back and purchased another one for my car. Fits well. Doesn't slide. Looks and feels like a quality product but of course only time will tell. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit and good feel.
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2007 Silverado Classic 3500 with 185,000 miles. The leather wrap on the factory steering wheel was partially worn off and torn at the 10 o'clock-11 o'clock position. When I measured the diameter of the wheel, I measured 15 1/4 inches, which was a bit smaller than the large size but too big for medium size. I decided to try the large size for this one and it fit perfectly plus it is comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Mike DeAngelo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my F250 Super Duty and Honda CRV!
customer_reviews.text: The large 15 1/2 to 16 steering wheel cover solved the problem of the wheel in my Ford Super Duty being too hot in the summer and too cold in the winter. It is now comfortable year round. It was not too difficult to install and stays in place. I also ordered a 15 inch cover for my 2012 Honda CRV and it fit perfectly. Again, it is comfortable and looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Gayleonthego

customer_reviews.title: Bought a second wheel cover!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a second wheel cover, solid black, for my 2004 Ram 1500 and absolutely love it. Looks great and feels great. I never liked wheel covers, but I have to say that this one changed my mind. It was a perfect fit for my 1995 Ram 2500 and not only looks great, but color coordinated with the interior of the truck. Now I'm looking to get another for my 2004 Ram 1500. I would recommend this wheel cover if you are looking for a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Velardi

customer_reviews.title: Durable, economical cover
customer_reviews.text: It's not fancy leather and it doesn't have a lot of padding, but it does the job for a good price. The microfiber is thick and appears very durable. There's just enough padding to provide a comfortable grip I installed this on a 2004 Nissan Frontier pickup that had a 15" steering wheel that was losing its coating. It took some work and pinched fingers to get it stretched all the way around the wheel, but it fits nice and tight. I let the cover heat up under direct sun for a while, which provided a bit more "give" for installation.
customer_reviews.author: MBH

customer_reviews.title: 2 man job! But good product.
customer_reviews.text: VERY hard to get on. I was convinced it was too small for my steering wheel (RAM 1500) and was going to return it- but alas, it is the right size. So tried again with a second person, lots of Armour All aka lube, and lots of stretching and pulling and tugging, but 10 minutes and 20 skinned raw knuckles later, we got it on! Quite the headache of an application but it is a TIGHT fit which is great once it's on; looks great, feels great. Better never have to remove it :)
customer_reviews.author: Mariah T

customer_reviews.title: The grip feels great, and the color is perfect (as in
customer_reviews.text: It's a really tight fit on my steering wheel (2005 Acura TL), but that isn't an issue because now it doesn't slip anywhere. The grip feels great, and the color is perfect (as in, it's actually white and not off-white or beige). It does feel a bit thicker than I expected it to, but I got used to that pretty quickly. Make sure to either measure your steering wheel or look up the specs online to see if this will fit your car.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Z.

customer_reviews.title: Sucked
customer_reviews.text: Did not like this product at all. I threw it in the trash! I don't have patience to deal with refunds and sending products back, but yes I will write a review and since it is my opinion, I hated this cheap thing.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: 5 star product and service
customer_reviews.text: My 13 year old steering wheel was disintegrating. My hands would get sticky driving it. I didn’t realize you could buy a new cover and then I found SEG. First, I ordered the wrong size. I should have measured more carefully. They very kindly sent me a replacement at no charge. It took me less than one minute to install. Couldn’t ask for a better product or better service. Well done SEG.
customer_reviews.author: The Scarolas

product_meta.title: SEG Direct Black Microfiber Leather Auto Car Steering Wheel Cover Universal 15 inch
feature_bullets: Made of smooth and durable microfiber leather
Suitable for middle-size steering wheels with diameter 14 1/2 inch to 15 inch(37cm to 39cm)
Perfect decor for your car, also protect your steering wheel

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars10,368 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
